tasks.name: Database Consultation
tasks.objective: to determine the best database structure and technology to use along with high-level outline design

tasks.name: Terms of Service

tasks.detail: Write terms of service for the product and digital properties

tasks.name: Content Marketing Strategy
tasks.skill: strategy, marketing, online, digital Social Media Marketing
tasks.objective: to develop our content strategy to drive user growth and awareness
tasks.result: 5 core platforms and appropriate approach for each developed with tactics articulated. Increase user growth by 1000%, awareness by 2000%

tasks.name: Research Project
tasks.objective: to help us validate our understanding of the market, sense our assumptions and provide deeper research and insight

tasks.detail: initial project research - health sector expert

tasks.name: Prototype Development
tasks.skill: Product Development, User Experience Design, Mobile, web development
tasks.objective: to build a clickable and visual prototype of our suggested solution

tasks.detail: help us build out a first, low fidelity, prototype in angular

tasks.name: Research on Accounting for Convertible Note (Debt)
tasks.objective: Research on accounting for convertible note under International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).
tasks.result: Reporting would be in the form of a memo which outlines the balance sheet presentation of the convertible note, the fair value of the note, and a foot note that could be included in the financial statements.
tasks.detail: I will provide the convertible note
